main.bio: I am Vaibhav, a B. Tech  3rd Year CSE Student at IIIT Gwalior, India. I have good knowledge of data structures and algorithms and have few projects also in the field of web development(MERN stack). I also have two months of internship experience as a full stack developer. Currently I'm looking for an Summer Internship 2021 in the field of Software Development
